about_the_game:
3D LOVER - The Nature Body will contain high-quality fitness and fashion sportswear. This DLC is a content pack focused on female players, providing players with more fitness and fashion choices to create an energetic and healthy lifestyle.
Through this DLC, players will get a series of high-quality fitness and fashion sportswear, whether it is worn in daily life or in the gym, it can make the player's character more refined and fashionable. The sports underwear set pays more attention to the lines and curves of the character, making the player's character more sexy and charming.
In short, the 3D LOVER - The Nature Body DLC will bring players more comprehensive fitness fashion choices, and at the same time bring more diversified content to the game. Whether it is showing your healthy lifestyle in the game, or trying different sports styles, this DLC will bring players a better gaming experience. Let's create a healthy and fashionable lifestyle together!

name: 3D LOVER - The Nature Body

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7\8\10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Celeron 1.5(1.5G) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: 3D LOVER - The Nature Body will contain high-quality fitness and fashion sportswear. This DLC is a content pack focused on female players, providing players with more fitness and fashion choices to create an energetic and healthy lifestyle.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian
